alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 3:09PM AKST until January 23 at 11:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...Until 11 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility will be reduced in blowing snow to one half mile at times. Snow is expected to diminish overnight from west to east and conditions will improve by the early morning hours Tuesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
